input.sentences: this weekend we went to a farmers market .
there were very interesting things there .
i kept seeing these weird ceramic statues .
they had a lot of fresh veggies .
output.sentences: The market was crowded on the weekend with many people looking for different goods and foods.
There was a bowl of vegetables that was particularly interesting that had a ceramic figure attached.
Accompanied with the bowl were two vases that also had similar designs.
The carrots were particularly fresh and looked delicious.
An assortment of flowers were beautifully arranged waiting to be taken home.
